title: New Zealand - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 33,500 BDT (Visa Fee) + 5,000 BDT (Service Fee) + 3,000 BDT (Optional Urgent Fee)
validity: Up to 90 days (determined by visa officer)

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with all current and expired passports scanned (all pages)
Completed and accurate online visa application form
Clear purpose of visit: tourism, temporary visit, business, or medical treatment
Proof of personal financial means and evidence of accommodation and return ticket
Travel itinerary including full tour plan and hotel booking
Proof of employment or business (NOC, salary slips, trade license, etc.)
Income tax documents (ITR or e-TIN), personal and company if applicable
All documents in Bangla must be translated into English and notarized
New Zealand visa process is fully online, only scanned documents required

details.title: Required Documents
items: Scanned copies of all current and expired passports (all pages)
Visa application form (online, completed by Chologhuri)
Two recent passport-size photos (3.5mm x 4.5mm), JPEG copy
Personal cover letter mentioning purpose, duration, travel, accommodation, and costs
Forwarding letter/NOC from employer with designation and purpose of travel
Salary certificate or last 3 months' pay slips
Tour plan (places, dates, and purpose) arranged by Chologhuri
Office ID or visiting card
Trade license, company memorandum (if self-employed/business owner)
Personal bank statement (last 6 months) with solvency certificate
Personal ITR or e-TIN certificate
Company bank statement and ITR (for business owners)
Reserved airline ticket and hotel accommodation itinerary (arranged by Chologhuri)
National ID Card or Birth Certificate
Marriage Certificate (if applicable)
Student ID and NOC for students
Family information form (provided by Chologhuri)
Proof of assets/FDR/Sanchaya Patra/deed copy (optional)
All Bangla documents must be translated and notarized (Chologhuri provides service)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
